Crochet stitches

Let's talk about a little bit about different stitches. Depending on your project which stitch is best.

Single Crochet

Step 1. Insert hook into the next sticth, yarn over, and pull up a loop.
Step 2. Then, yarn over again and pull through both loops on the hook.

Double Crochet

Step 1. Yarn over. Insert the hook into the next stitch, yarn over, and pull up a loop.
Step 2. Yarn over and pull through two loops on the hook.
Step 3. Yarn over again and pull through both loops on the hook.

Half Double Crochet

Step 1. Yarn over, and insert the hook into the next stitch.
Step 2. Yarn over and pull up a loop.
Step 3. Yarn over again, and pull the yarn through all three loops on the hook.

Treble Crochet

Step 1. Yarn over twice. Insert hook into the next stitch, yarn over, and pull up a loop.
Step 2. Yarn over and pull through the first two loops on the hook.
Step 3. Yarn over again and pull through the next two loops on the hook.
Step 4. Yarn over again and pull through the last two loops on the hook.
